code: parent_dir <- withr::local_tempdir() project_dir <- "babelbook" quarto_bin <- quarto::quarto_path() withr::with_dir(parent_dir, {   sys::exec_wait(     quarto_bin,     args = c("create-project", project_dir, "--type", "book")   ) }) #> [1] 0 project_path <- file.path(parent_dir, project_dir) babelquarto::register_main_language(main_language = "en", project_path = project_path) babelquarto::register_further_languages(further_languages = "es", project_path = project_path) project:   type: book  book:   title: "babelbook"   author: "Norah Jones"   date: "1/25/2024"   chapters:     - index.qmd     - intro.qmd     - summary.qmd     - references.qmd  bibliography: references.bib  format:   html:     theme: cosmo   pdf:     documentclass: scrreprt     babelquarto:   languagecodes:   - name: es     text: "Version in es"   - name: en     text: "Version in en"   mainlanguage: 'en'   languages: ['es'] title-es: title in es description-es: description in es author-es: author in es lang: en - part: Building Your Package     part-es: Construyendo tu paquete     chapters:     - pkg_building.Rmd     - pkg_ci.Rmd     - pkg_security.Rmd book:   title: Cool book   author: Myself  title-es: Libro genial author-es: Yo misma
